name: Pop (itch) (Pixelbyte Studios)
description:
POP is a game where you play as a man running a balloon stand but all of the balloons in the stand are floating off! Pop them before they get too far! This game offers a very addicting experience and an interesting gameplay along with a lot of nice colors! As you progress in the game, the balloons will appear more frequently and will move faster!

In Game Binds: There are not many keybinds but pressing COMMA will reset your highscore!
